text: Beatriz Barba Ahuactzin (16 September 1928 â€“ 29 January 2021) was a Mexican academic, anthropologist and archaeologist. She was a member of the National System of Researchers from 1985. She was a member of the Mexican Academy of Sciences. Barba died on 29 January 2021, aged 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican anthropologists Category:Archaeologists Category:Mexican academics Category:Scientists from Mexico City
